attributes.action: The Northern Ireland Executive is not fit for purpose
attributes.additional_details:
Religious and sectarian based voting. We will never move forward as long as we vote to 'keep the other party out'. We need to get out of the past and start thinking about our children's future. We lack forward thinking and it has to change.

http://www.irishnews.com/news/2015/05/06/news/robinson-kelly-should-apologise-for-election-flyer-129058/

http://www.newsletter.co.uk/news/election-diary-letter-from-arlene-sees-dup-accused-of-gutter-politics-1-7359945
attributes.background:
Our health service is at breaking point due to funding issues, meanwhile millions of pounds are wasted on inquiries and schemes such as the RHI scheme.

A voting system based on religious and sectarian beliefs. The end result is the wrong people holding office who are not fit for the job.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
